text: Adrit Roy (born 25 May 1992) is a Bengali film actor. == Early life and education == Roy was born in Kolkata. He went to La Martiniere Calcutta school, where he was active in theater and performance.https://www.cinestaan.com/articles/2018/feb/25/11277/i-don-t-see- much-of-noor-in-me-adrit-roy-on-playing-suburban-character-in-noor-jahaan == Career == Roy made his film debut playing the eponymous role in Abhimanyu Mukherjee's 2018 film Noor Jahaan. In 2019, he starred in Prem Amar 2 as Joy. He also acted in Dev Entertainment Ventures' Password, directed by Kamaleshwar Mukherjee, as well as Raj Chakraborty Productions' Parineeta, directed by Raj Chakraborty. ==Filmography== {| Class="wikitable sortable" |- !
